en.refresh_tip: Only support changing a batch of unselected scenarios
en.auto_desc: Click a scene to preview; click Refresh to recalculate, then select and save desired scenes.
en.needToStudy: It's too difficult, I need to study more. Please manually create the scene!
en.soDifficult: It's so difficult, I feel like I've run out of inspiration...
en.preset_sync_in_progress: Template editing in progress, operation not allowed
en.execut_error: Execution failed, please try again later
en.generate_failed: Generation failed, please try again later
en.disabled_action_tip: Refresh in progress, please operate later
en.select_limit_tip: You can set up to 20 scenes, limit reached
en.no_admin_permission: You do not have admin permissions to perform this operation

zh.refresh_tip: 仅支持未选中的场景换一批
zh.auto_desc: 单击场景支持场景预览、点击“刷新”按键，可以重新计算该场景 ，勾选你想要的“场景”进行保存
zh.needToStudy: 太难了，还要再学习学习，辛苦您手动 创建场景吧！
zh.soDifficult: 好难啊，感觉自己灵感枯竭了...'
zh.preset_sync_in_progress: 模板编辑中, 不可操作
zh.disabled_refresh_tip: 刷新过程中不支持预览
zh.disabled_action_tip: 正在刷新中，请稍后操作
zh.select_limit_tip: 最多设置20个场景, 已达上限
zh.no_admin_permission: 您没有管理员权限，无法进行此操作
